m_szDocTitle: Bentley SUV is a V6 Hybrid | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Bentley SUV is a V6 Hybrid May 2nd, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     If you give a serial murderer a water gun, is he all of a sudden not evil? Obviously not. If you give an SUV a hybrid drivetrain, is it all of a sudden clean and green? Well, I guess that depends on who you ask. For a more nuanced discussion of this matter, as it concerns a V6 hybrid Bentley SUV that’s apparently in the works, here’s a Gas2 post from Jo Borras (at least half of which I don’t understand — have I told you I’m not a car guy?): Green is the New Fast:  Bentley’s New SUV is a V6 Hybrid (via Gas 2.0 ) Bentley’s latest new
